title: Blue bars on map

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have been encountering this bug for a couple days now, i have no idea what started it or how to fix it.  Does not inpact game in a major way but having it fixed/knowing how to fix it would be helpful.

replies.body:
Hey guys - this was me. If you're using any of the settings that adjust your HUD positioning (flipped minimap, team frames on left etc) the bars will show up for Manaflow Band/Presence of Mind on teammates.

Bug should be fixed in 8.1, but if it's too annoying a temporary fix is to use the default HUD settings.

Leave it like this and let's call it a training of map awareness.
One does not simply miss Lee Sin preparing for sneaky gank when you have to watch your Support's Manaflow Band status.
For more life hacks subscribe to my channel.

It's caused by your allies taking Manaflow Band. It probably will also be caused by Presence of Mind. The light-blue bars should take place where the mana bars are.

I do not know any current fixes you can personally do, but try switching your allies' portrait to the other side (in the settings, I think).
Ive been experiencing this also. I think its Riot saying “Lol you dont need a map”

The only reason they do not look like the same colour as the mana bars normally, is because there is an opacity layer over the mana gauge that is not present in this graphical glitch, if I would have a guess.
